sn44.9:4.1: Atha kho vacchagotto paribbājako yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami;
sn44.9:4.3: Sammodanīyaṃ kathaṃ sāraṇīyaṃ vītisāretvā ekamantaṃ nisīdi.
sn44.9:4.4: Ekamantaṃ nisinno kho vacchagotto paribbājako bhagavantaṃ etadavoca:
sn44.9:5.1: “Purimāni, bho gotama, divasāni purimatarāni sambahulānaṃ nānātitthiyānaṃ samaṇabrāhmaṇānaṃ paribbājakānaṃ kutūhalasālāyaṃ sannisinnānaṃ sannipatitānaṃ ayamantarākathā udapādi:
sn44.9:5.2: ‘ayaṃ kho pūraṇo kassapo saṅghī ceva gaṇī ca gaṇācariyo ca ñāto yasassī titthakaro sādhusammato bahujanassa.
sn44.9:5.3: Sopi sāvakaṃ abbhatītaṃ kālaṅkataṃ upapattīsu byākaroti:
sn44.9:5.5: Yopissa sāvako uttamapuriso paramapuriso paramapattipatto tampi sāvakaṃ abbhatītaṃ kālaṅkataṃ upapattīsu byākaroti:
sn44.9:6.3: ayampi kho sañcayo belaṭṭhaputto … pe …
sn44.9:6.4: ayampi kho pakudho kaccāno … pe …
sn44.9:6.5: ayampi kho ajito kesakambalo saṃghī ceva gaṇī ca gaṇācariyo ca ñāto yasassī titthakaro sādhusammato bahujanassa.
sn44.9:6.6: Sopi sāvakaṃ abbhatītaṃ kālaṅkataṃ upapattīsu byākaroti:
sn44.9:6.8: Yopissa sāvako uttamapuriso paramapuriso paramapattipatto tampi sāvakaṃ abbhatītaṃ kālaṅkataṃ upapattīsu byākaroti:
sn44.9:7.1: Ayampi kho samaṇo gotamo saṃghī ceva gaṇī ca gaṇācariyo ca ñāto yasassī titthakaro sādhusammato bahujanassa.
sn44.9:7.2: Sopi sāvakaṃ abbhatītaṃ kālaṅkataṃ upapattīsu byākaroti:
sn44.9:7.4: Yopissa sāvako uttamapuriso paramapuriso paramapattipatto tañca sāvakaṃ abbhatītaṃ kālaṅkataṃ upapattīsu na byākaroti:
sn44.9:7.6: Api ca kho naṃ evaṃ byākaroti:
sn44.9:7.7: ‘acchecchi taṇhaṃ, vivattayi saṃyojanaṃ, sammā mānābhisamayā antamakāsi dukkhassā’ti.
sn44.9:7.8: Tassa mayhaṃ, bho gotama, ahu deva kaṅkhā, ahu vicikicchā:
sn44.9:7.9: ‘kathaṃ nāma samaṇassa gotamassa dhammo abhiññeyyo’”ti?
sn44.9:8.2: Kaṅkhanīye ca pana te ṭhāne vicikicchā uppannā.
sn44.9:8.3: Saupādānassa khvāhaṃ, vaccha, upapattiṃ paññāpemi no anupādānassa.
sn44.9:8.4: Seyyathāpi, vaccha, aggi saupādāno jalati, no anupādāno;
sn44.9:8.5: evameva khvāhaṃ, vaccha, saupādānassa upapattiṃ paññāpemi, no anupādānassā”ti.
sn44.9:9.1: “Yasmiṃ, bho gotama, samaye acci vātena khittā dūrampi gacchati, imassa pana bhavaṃ gotamo kiṃ upādānasmiṃ paññāpetī”ti?
sn44.9:9.2: “Yasmiṃ kho, vaccha, samaye acci vātena khittā dūrampi gacchati, tamahaṃ vātūpādānaṃ paññāpemi.
sn44.9:9.3: Vāto hissa, vaccha, tasmiṃ samaye upādānaṃ hotī”ti.
sn44.9:9.4: “Yasmiñca pana, bho gotama, samaye imañca kāyaṃ nikkhipati, satto ca aññataraṃ kāyaṃ anupapanno hoti, imassa pana bhavaṃ gotamo kiṃ upādānasmiṃ paññāpetī”ti?
sn44.9:9.5: “Yasmiṃ kho, vaccha, samaye imañca kāyaṃ nikkhipati, satto ca aññataraṃ kāyaṃ anupapanno hoti, tamahaṃ taṇhūpādānaṃ vadāmi.
sn44.9:9.6: Taṇhā hissa, vaccha, tasmiṃ samaye upādānaṃ hotī”ti.
